outputs.output_descr: The Government of Kuwait is keen to activate the planning function within the state to support social and economic progress leading to economic growth and raising the quality of life for the citizens of the state. UNDP is supporting the General Secretariat of the Supreme Council for Planning and Development GSSCPD to develop its capacity to improve the quality of its products and services enabling it to perform its functions effectively and directing the strategic objectives of the plan, in its capacity as the leading agency for strategic planning and development within the state.

project_descr: The government of Kuwait is keen to activate the planning function within the state in order to ensure the optimal use and best distribution of available resources to support social and economic process.
project_title: Support Capacity Dev of GSSCPD to Direct Strategic plan
